game.title: The Quest for the Golden Relic
game.objective: Uncover the ancient artifact and unlock its secrets
game.description: A thrilling quest to discover a legendary artifact, requiring deduction, bravery, and strategic thinking. Seek out the clues scattered across the kingdom and overcome formidable obstacles.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a rare artifact

task.description: Decipher the cryptogram at the ancient monument to learn the next clue's location - Temple of Sunlight.
Defeat the guards in the enchanted forest and obtain the amulet for entrance to the hidden chamber.
Navigate the labyrinthine maze, guided by the moon's light, to reach the treasure chamber.
